price: Ɔno ne Kokoa mu ne Badwa mu Nimdefoͻ no, Otumfoᴐ no a otumi ade nyinaa yε no, Ahumumᴐborᴐ Hene no -
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: dhālika ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
